For my holiday post , I offer a message of hope for the business world .
1,2 PER|5,6 PER
1,2 PER|5,6 PER

In 1994 , I was a graduate student in Boston .
3,4 PER|7,8 PER|9,10 GPE
3,4 PER|7,8 PER|9,10 GPE

I was asked to moderate a panel discussion on social entrepreneurship for a conference at Harvard Business School .
0,1 PER|15,18 ORG|13,14 Contact:Meet
0,1 PER|15,18 ORG|13,14 Contact:Meet

The conference was being held by a new group called Students for Responsible Business .
8,9 ORG|10,14 ORG|1,2 Contact:Meet|1,9 Entity
8,9 ORG|10,14 ORG|1,2 Contact:Meet|1,9 Entity

I expected to see a small gathering of idealistic , slightly naive MBA students .
0,1 PER|6,7 PER|13,14 PER
0,1 PER|6,7 PER|13,14 PER

What I found was a packed room of 200 intelligent , practical , driven idealists .
1,2 PER|6,7 FAC|14,15 PER
1,2 PER|6,7 FAC|14,15 PER

These students were determined to figure out how to use business as a driver for positive social change .
1,2 PER
1,2 PER

I left that room with my eyes open to the possibilities presented by these future business leaders .
0,1 PER|3,4 FAC|5,6 PER|15,16 ORG|16,17 PER
0,1 PER|3,4 FAC|5,6 PER|15,16 ORG|16,17 PER

Fast forward 10 years .



Students for Responsible Business is now called Net Impact .
0,4 ORG|7,9 ORG
0,4 ORG|7,9 ORG

In 2004 , I had the opportunity to attend their conference hosted by The University of Texas McCombs Business School .
3,4 PER|9,10 ORG|14,17 ORG|17,20 ORG|10,11 Contact:Meet|3,11 r_Entity
3,4 PER|9,10 ORG|14,17 ORG|17,20 ORG|10,11 Contact:Meet|3,11 r_Entity

Net Impact had grown to include over 9 , 000 MBA students and alumni .
0,2 ORG|11,12 PER|13,14 PER
0,2 ORG|11,12 PER|13,14 PER

Approximately 900 people attended the 2004 conference .
2,3 PER|6,7 Contact:Meet|2,7 r_Entity
2,3 PER|6,7 Contact:Meet|2,7 r_Entity

The buzz words flying around the conference included social entrepreneurship , sustainable profitability , working with passion .



I met student after student intent on harnessing the forces of business and capitalism to improve the world .
0,1 PER|2,3 PER|4,5 PER|17,18 LOC|1,2 Contact:Meet|0,2 r_Entity|1,3 Entity|1,5 Entity
0,1 PER|2,3 PER|4,5 PER|17,18 LOC|1,2 Contact:Meet|0,2 r_Entity|1,3 Entity|1,5 Entity

These students understand that business is a powerful lever of change in this world .
1,2 PER|13,14 LOC
1,2 PER|13,14 LOC

5,6 ORG|9,10 PER

0,1 PER|8,9 PER|10,11 PER|14,15 PER|15,16 ORG

Right now students at business schools are asking for more discussion of these topics in classes , are initiating service projects , forming support group for social entrepreneurs , inviting speakers to campus to discuss sustainability , social investing , non - profit innovations , etc .
2,3 PER|5,6 ORG|24,25 PER|27,28 PER|30,31 PER|32,33 FAC

Net Impact is often at the center of these efforts .
0,2 ORG
0,2 ORG

2,4 PER

-- Last year auditors discovered Arafat was guilty of skimming $ 2 million a month from the gasoline trade in the territories , TIME reports . In August 2002 international donors forced Arafat to sign over his investments to the Palestine Investment Fund , which was audited by U . S . accountants and managed by Palestinian Finance Minister Salam Fayyad , a former International Monetary Fund official .

After scouring corporations throughout the Arab world and bank accounts in the Cayman Islands and Luxembourg , the auditors identified $ 800 million , which has been made a part of the Palestinian Authority ' s official budget .

Greg Werkheiser , candidate for the House of Delegates from the 42nd District in southern Fairfax County , has raised significantly more money to date than his incumbent opponent , David Albo , and leads all challengers statewide in fundraising , according to reports filed with the State Board of Elections on January 18 , 2005 .

2005 - 02 - 03T21 : 02 : 00



Socially responsible investing .



Corporate social responsibility .



Just saying these words seems to elicit some fairly simplistic knee - jerk reactions .



The reaction that I find most amusing is the knowing look of sympathy .
3,4 PER
3,4 PER

You know , the one that says " Poor naive soul .
0,1 PER|10,11 PER
0,1 PER|10,11 PER

If only you understood economics , you would understand the folly of your ways ."
2,3 PER|6,7 PER|12,13 PER
2,3 PER|6,7 PER|12,13 PER

I do not intend to get into the stakeholder vs stockholder debate here or argue the relative merits of Atlas Shrugged .
0,1 PER|8,9 PER|10,11 PER
0,1 PER|8,9 PER|10,11 PER

Those discussions , though interesting , avoid a simpler question .



Do measures of corporate social responsibility contain valuable added information that help investors pick winning investments ?
12,13 PER
12,13 PER

If all that you have read about this topic is an article in Business Week or The Wall Street Journal , you ' ve probably heard the standard answer -- the evidence is mixed .
3,4 PER|13,15 ORG|17,20 ORG|21,22 PER
3,4 PER|13,15 ORG|17,20 ORG|21,22 PER

That is true but not very revealing wouldn ' t you say ?
10,11 PER
10,11 PER

Evidence is mixed mostly because ( 1 ) there is little agreement about how to measure social responsibility and ( 2 ) many current measures toss together a heap of information that has no business being lumped together .
34,35 ORG
34,35 ORG

Social responsibility often includes everything from treatment of employees to type of product produced .
8,9 PER
8,9 PER

There is not really any reason to believe that selling guns or tobacco has anything to do with forcing employees to work unpaid overtime .
10,11 WEA|19,20 PER
10,11 WEA|19,20 PER

Yet both get lumped together in the socially responsible investing discussion .



Once you start to break apart social responsibility into its various components , you start to see the valuable information .
1,2 PER|13,14 PER
1,2 PER|13,14 PER

Companies that have poor employee relations tend to underperform , as do companies that pollute at a higher rate than their industry peers .
0,1 ORG|4,5 PER|12,13 ORG|13,14 ORG|20,21 ORG|22,23 ORG
0,1 ORG|4,5 PER|12,13 ORG|13,14 ORG|20,21 ORG|22,23 ORG

On the other hand , companies with numerous NLRB violations don ' t do worse than their peers and companies that sell your typical " sin " products ( tobacco , firearms , gambling ) can be excellent investments .
5,6 ORG|8,9 ORG|16,17 ORG|17,18 ORG|19,20 ORG|20,21 ORG|22,23 PER|31,32 WEA|38,39 ORG
5,6 ORG|8,9 ORG|16,17 ORG|17,18 ORG|19,20 ORG|20,21 ORG|22,23 PER|31,32 WEA|38,39 ORG

Lump all these things together and of course you will get mixed results .
8,9 PER
8,9 PER

Taken separately , they provide valuable information about future firm performance .
9,10 ORG
9,10 ORG

I guess it is time to get beyond the image of the greedy capitalist vs . hippie tree hugger in this discussion .
0,1 PER|13,14 PER|16,17 PER|18,19 PER
0,1 PER|13,14 PER|16,17 PER|18,19 PER

Though that would make a great Celebrity Death Match episode .



Here are abstracts from 16 significant studies about socially responsible investing and an interesting essay on the subject .



Byrne
0,1 PER
0,1 PER

3,4 PER|24,25 ORG
3,4 PER|24,25 ORG

2,3 PER
2,3 PER

4,5 ORG|7,8 PER|13,14 PER
4,5 ORG|7,8 PER|13,14 PER

Their marketing was absolutely brilliant : Simply through association with Google , and because of the invitation - only membership , they created a product with instant cachet -- something so in demand invitations went for $ 50 on eBay , and one enterprising site even offered a kidney for an invite .
0,1 ORG|10,11 ORG|21,22 ORG|39,40 ORG
0,1 ORG|10,11 ORG|21,22 ORG|39,40 ORG

WASHINGTON
0,1 GPE
0,1 GPE

U . S . intelligence officials now believe North Korea is developing the technology to make nuclear warheads small enough to fit atop the country ' s growing arsenal of missideS ( potentially putting Tokyo and U . S . troops based in Japan at risk , according to officials who have received the intelligence reports .
0,3 GPE|4,5 ORG|5,6 PER|8,10 GPE|17,18 WEA|24,25 GPE|28,29 WEA|30,31 WEA|34,35 GPE|36,39 GPE|40,41 PER|43,44 GPE|49,50 PER|50,51 PER
0,3 GPE|4,5 ORG|5,6 PER|8,10 GPE|17,18 WEA|24,25 GPE|28,29 WEA|30,31 WEA|34,35 GPE|36,39 GPE|40,41 PER|43,44 GPE|49,50 PER|50,51 PER

In the assessment , which they have shared with Japan , South Korea and other allies in recent weeks , officials at the Central Intelligence Agency said that U . S . satellites have identified a sophisticated new nuclear testing site in an area called Youngdoktong .
5,6 PER|9,10 GPE|11,13 GPE|15,16 GPE|20,21 PER|23,26 ORG|28,31 GPE|32,33 FAC|40,41 FAC|43,44 LOC|45,46 LOC
5,6 PER|9,10 GPE|11,13 GPE|15,16 GPE|20,21 PER|23,26 ORG|28,31 GPE|32,33 FAC|40,41 FAC|43,44 LOC|45,46 LOC

At the site , equipment has been set up to test conventional explosives that , when detonated , could compress a plutonium core and set onfe nuclear explosion .
2,3 FAC|12,13 WEA|13,14 WEA
2,3 FAC|12,13 WEA|13,14 WEA

[ oMa intelligence officials believe that the existence of the testing range is evidence that the country intends to manufacture much more sophisticated weapons that would be light enough to put onto its growing arsenal of medium - and long - range missiles .
2,3 ORG|3,4 PER|11,12 FAC|16,17 GPE|23,24 WEA|24,25 WEA|32,33 GPE|34,35 WEA|42,43 WEA
2,3 ORG|3,4 PER|11,12 FAC|16,17 GPE|23,24 WEA|24,25 WEA|32,33 GPE|34,35 WEA|42,43 WEA

Previously , U . S . officials had said they were uncertain whether North Korea had received enough outside technical help to even attempt to make such a `` miniaturized '' nuclear warhead .
2,5 GPE|6,7 PER|9,10 PER|13,15 GPE|32,33 WEA
2,5 GPE|6,7 PER|9,10 PER|13,15 GPE|32,33 WEA

The new testing capability would suggest that the North Koreans are getting closer _ now , officials said , the intelligence reports say they could do in in as little as a year or less .
8,10 GPE|16,17 PER|23,24 GPE
8,10 GPE|16,17 PER|23,24 GPE

But officials say there is no sure way of knowing that they can until they actually test one .
1,2 PER|11,12 GPE|14,15 GPE|17,18 WEA
1,2 PER|11,12 GPE|14,15 GPE|17,18 WEA

Senior administration officials say that Washington has been trying to convince Asia gent that it requires a unified diplomatic front to force the country to give up its weapons .

1,2 ORG|2,3 PER|5,6 GPE|11,12 GPE|14,15 GPE|23,24 GPE|27,28 GPE|28,29 WEA

The new intelligence is apparently being marshaled to support the administration ' s argument .
10,11 ORG
10,11 ORG

2,3 PER|3,4 PER|9,12 GPE|28,29 FAC|30,31 FAC|33,35 GPE|39,40 FAC
2,3 PER|3,4 PER|9,12 GPE|28,29 FAC|30,31 FAC|33,35 GPE|39,40 FAC

North Korea has never tested a nuclear weapon , though the CIA long ago estimated that it manufactured two crude devices in the late 1980s or early 1990s .
0,2 GPE|7,8 WEA|11,12 ORG|16,17 GPE|20,21 WEA
0,2 GPE|7,8 WEA|11,12 ORG|16,17 GPE|20,21 WEA

North Korea , unlike Iraq , has made no secret of its plan to develop nuclear weapons .
0,2 GPE|4,5 GPE|11,12 GPE|16,17 WEA

`` This would give them the range they never had before , and the chance to spread their threat far beyond South Korea ,'' said one senior Asian official , noting that approximately 60 , 000 U . S . troops are based in Japan .

The talks are the first high - level U . S .- North Korean contact since tensions over the North ' s nuclear program spiked six months ago over Washington ' s claim that the North said in October it was trying to develop nuclear weapons in violation of a 1994 pledge .

A U . S .- sponsored forum that brought Iraqi opposition leaders together to shape the country ' s postwar government began Tuesday with a U . S . promise not to rule Iraq and concluded with an agreement to meet again in 10 days .

A rocket holding the first of two Mars rovers blasted off Tuesday on a seven - month voyage to the red planet where the golf - cart - sized vehicles will search for evidence that there was once enough water to support life on Mars .

Thunderstorms delayed the launch by two days , and launch officials contended with a last - minute communications glitch between stations that will track the spacecraft .

The second rover , named Opportunity , will be launched later this month , and both are expected to arrive at Mars in January .
2,3 VEH|5,6 VEH|15,16 VEH|21,22 LOC|9,10 Movement:Transport|2,10 r_Artifact|9,22 Destination|19,20 Movement:Transport|15,20 r_Artifact|19,22 Destination

Moving on six wheels , the $ 800 million rovers act as robotic geologists .
9,10 VEH|13,14 VEH
9,10 VEH|13,14 VEH

Each is equipped with a panoramic camera , a camera for close - up views of rocks and a drill to cut into rocks .
0,1 VEH
0,1 VEH

The data will be transmitted back to Earth .
7,8 LOC
7,8 LOC

Previous missions have shown Mars had water in the past , but scientists want to find out how long the water was there and in what quantities .
4,5 LOC|12,13 PER|22,23 LOC
4,5 LOC|12,13 PER|22,23 LOC

Scientists believe the water may show that Mars once was able to support life .
0,1 PER|7,8 LOC
0,1 PER|7,8 LOC

The rovers ' landing sites , on opposite sides of the planet , were chosen for their likelihood of holding evidence of water .
1,2 VEH|4,5 LOC|8,9 LOC|11,12 LOC|16,17 LOC|3,4 Movement:Transport|1,4 r_Vehicle|3,9 Destination
1,2 VEH|4,5 LOC|8,9 LOC|11,12 LOC|16,17 LOC|3,4 Movement:Transport|1,4 r_Vehicle|3,9 Destination

Studying the minerals in rocks can tell scientists how the rocks were formed , whether they were ever submerged in water , and whether hot water ever ran over them .
7,8 PER
7,8 PER

The rovers are expected to travel up to 132 feet ( 39 . 6 meters ) each Martian day , which is 24 hours and 39 { minutes long .
1,2 VEH|17,18 LOC
1,2 VEH|17,18 LOC

The missions are expected to last three months but could run longer .



The rovers eventually will shut down as dust builds up on their solar panels and they will remain on the planet .
1,2 VEH|11,12 VEH|15,16 VEH|20,21 LOC
1,2 VEH|11,12 VEH|15,16 VEH|20,21 LOC

Only 12 out of 30 previous attempts have reached Mars , and only three out of nine attempts have succeeded in landing on the planet .
9,10 LOC|24,25 LOC
9,10 LOC|24,25 LOC

NASA revamped its Mars program after the failure of two unmanned missions to Mars four years ago .

ADDIS ABABA , March 17 ( Xinhua )
0,2 GPE|6,7 ORG

Interim Chairperson of the Commission of the African Union ( AU ) Amara Essy has strongly condemned the coup d ' etat that took place in the Central Africa Republic on March 15 , 2003 .
1,2 PER|4,9 ORG|10,11 ORG|12,14 PER|27,30 GPE|18,19 Conflict:Attack|18,28 Place|18,29 Place|18,30 Place
1,2 PER|4,9 ORG|10,11 ORG|12,14 PER|27,30 GPE|18,19 Conflict:Attack|18,30 Place

According to a press release of the AU on Monday , Essy said AU " rejects and unequivocally condemns unconstitutional change of government in keeping with the provisions of it s constitutive act as well as the decisions and declarations adopted by the Algiers and Lome Summits ."
7,8 ORG|11,12 PER|13,14 ORG|22,23 ORG|29,30 ORG|43,44 GPE|45,46 GPE

Russia objected to World Bank rules that required monitoring of patients receiving medication , the World Bank said .

But after drawn - out talks , President Vladimir Putin signed off on the loan , which will take effect this year , the World Bank said .

`` Russia has one of the fastest growing AIDS epidemics in the world '' and has a `` fearsome '' problem with tuberculosis , particularly drug - resistant strains , said Olesoji Adeyi , a World Bank health specialist .
1,2 GPE|12,13 LOC|31,33 PER|35,37 ORG|38,39 PER
1,2 GPE|12,13 LOC|31,33 PER|35,37 ORG|38,39 PER

`` It ' s a potential dual epidemic ,'' he said , adding that people with immune systems weakened by the AIDS virus are especially vulnerable to contracting TB , which he called an `` opportunistic disease .''
9,10 PER|14,15 PER|31,32 PER
9,10 PER|14,15 PER|31,32 PER

AIDS came relatively late to Russia , but spread rapidly , primarily due to intravenous drug abuse and a lack of prevention programs .
5,6 GPE
5,6 GPE

WASHINGTON _ Having punched through severely depleted Republican Guard divisions that formed Baghdad ' s outer defensive ring , U . S . Army and Marine forces are likely to pause again to test the Iraqi capital ' s inner defenses and waall but evaporated under the weight of the U . S . assault .

A small group of Iraqi defenders has been holding out inside the city in a mosque , considered a Shiite holy site , and local clerics said one religious leader had recently arrived in hopes of arranging for their safe passage out of the shrine .

UNITED NATIONS ( AP )
0,2 FAC|3,4 ORG
0,2 FAC|3,4 ORG

France on Tuesday proposed immediately suspending U . N . sanctions targeting Iraq civilians , an important step toward the U . S . goal of ending trade embargoes that have crippled the country ' s economy .
0,1 GPE|6,9 ORG|12,13 GPE|13,14 PER|20,23 GPE|33,34 GPE
0,1 GPE|6,9 ORG|12,13 GPE|13,14 PER|20,23 GPE|33,34 GPE

The surprise move by France , which led opposition to the U . S . war against Iraq , followed last week ' s call by U . S . President George W . Bush for sanctions to be lifted quickly , so Iraq can trade freely and its oil revenue can be used to finance reconstruction .
4,5 GPE|6,7 GPE|11,14 GPE|17,18 GPE|26,29 GPE|30,31 PER|31,35 PER|43,44 GPE|48,49 GPE|15,16 Conflict:Attack|11,16 r_Attacker|12,16 r_Attacker|13,16 r_Attacker|15,18 Place

France ' s U . N . ambassador , Jean - Marc de La Sabliere , made the proposal at a Security Council meeting where members heard a briefing by chief U . N . weapons inspector Hans Blix and for the first time exchanged views on potentially divisive postwar issues .
0,1 GPE|3,6 ORG|7,8 PER|9,15 PER|21,23 ORG|25,26 PER|31,34 ORG|35,36 WEA|36,37 PER|37,39 PER|23,24 Contact:Meet|9,24 r_Entity|10,24 r_Entity|11,24 r_Entity|12,24 r_Entity|13,24 r_Entity|14,24 r_Entity|23,26 Entity|23,38 Entity|23,39 Entity|49,50 Conflict:Attack

The proposal would end the U . N . ban on trade and investment in Iraq while leaving a 12 - year - old arms embargo in place .
5,8 ORG|15,16 GPE|24,25 WEA
5,8 ORG|15,16 GPE|24,25 WEA

The Security Council imposed sanctions after Iraq ' s 1990 invasion of Kuwait .

Under council resolutions , sanctions cannot be lifted until U . N . inspectors certify that Iraq ' s nuclear , chemical and biological weapons have been destroyed along with the long - range missiles to deliver them .

A military court said he intended to pass the notes to Japanese media with which he had worked .

0,1 GPE|5,6 ORG
0,1 GPE|5,6 ORG

China late this year will start building a nuclear - powered desalinator project in Yantai City in east China ' s Shandong Province , with a designed capacity of producing 52 million tons of fresh water a year .
0,1 GPE|14,16 GPE|18,19 LOC|21,23 GPE
0,1 GPE|14,16 GPE|18,19 LOC|21,23 GPE

Officials with the Development Planning Commission of the Shandong provincial government said the project , to be built in cooperation with Qinghua University , would alleviate water shortages in the city and other parts of the Shandong Peninsula .
0,1 PER|3,6 ORG|8,9 GPE|10,11 GPE|21,23 ORG|30,31 GPE|33,34 LOC|36,38 GPE
0,1 PER|3,6 ORG|8,9 GPE|10,11 GPE|21,23 ORG|30,31 GPE|33,34 LOC|36,38 GPE

Yantai and other parts of Shandong suffered acute water shortages due to droughts in recent years , changing climate and other reasons .
0,1 GPE|3,4 LOC|5,6 GPE
0,1 GPE|3,4 LOC|5,6 GPE

Approved by the State Development and Reform Commission , the project is expected to cost 1 . 6 billion yuan ( nearly 200 million US dollars ).
3,8 ORG|24,25 GPE
3,8 ORG|24,25 GPE

Zhang Zuoyi , director of the Nuclear Energy Technology and Design Institute attached to Qinghua University , was quoted in Monday ' s Beijing Evening News as saying the fresh water to be produced from the project will cost 3 . 75 yuan per ton , much less than the cost of water from existing sources .
0,2 PER|3,4 PER|6,12 ORG|14,16 ORG|23,26 ORG
0,2 PER|3,4 PER|6,12 ORG|14,16 ORG|23,26 ORG

The project is expected to use a 200 - megawatt nuclear - powered reactor designed by the institute , according to the paper .
17,18 ORG|22,23 ORG
17,18 ORG|22,23 ORG

The project would be completed and operational in 2007 , it said .

4,5 FAC|6,7 GPE|10,11 ORG|11,12 PER

Pavel Pitterman , the spokesman for the State Office for Nuclear Safety , said his office gave the plant permission to run its second , newer 1 , 000 - megawatt unit at full capacity .

0,2 PER|4,5 PER|7,12 ORG|14,15 PER|15,16 ORG|18,19 FAC|22,23 FAC

The plant ' s first 1 , 000 - megawatt unit has already operated at full capacity during past tests .
1,2 FAC
1,2 FAC

The spokesman for the Temelin plant , Milan Nebesar , said that an 18 - month trial production at full capacity at the second unit , needed to declare the unit ready for commercial production , would start Friday .
1,2 PER|4,5 GPE|5,6 ORG|7,9 PER
1,2 PER|4,5 GPE|5,6 ORG|7,9 PER

The plant , based on Russian design and upgraded with U . S . technology , has been plagued by frequent , non - nuclear malfunctions since testing began in November 2000 .
1,2 FAC|5,6 GPE|10,13 GPE
1,2 FAC|5,6 GPE|10,13 GPE

Located just 60 kilometers ( 35 miles ) north of the Austrian border , it has been a source of friction between the two countries .

Critics in non - nuclear Austria argue the plant is unsafe and demand that it be shut down , but Czech authorities insist the plant is safe .

After the Camp David talks , Blair , who analysts say has been pursuing a special relationship with Washington in order to restore Britain ' s traditional role as a transatlantic " bridge ", was forced to readjust his tone .

In a joint written statement , the two allies pledged to seek UN Security Council resolutions to affirm Iraq ' s territorial integrity , ensure aid delivery and endorse an " appropriate " post - conflict administration for Iraq .

The United Nations would have a " vital role " in the effort to repair Iraq ' s infrastructure , Blair told reporters at a news conference after his talks with Bush , downplaying UN role in emphasizing that ultimately the country must be run by the Iraqi people .

" The key is that Iraq in the end should be governed by the Iraqi people ," Blair said , pledging that British and US forces would not stay in the country " a day longer than necessary ".

It was a " false choice " to debate whether Iraq should be run by coalition forces or the United Nations , said Blair , who was believed to be in favor of a stronger UN role in post - conflict Iraq than Bush .

Echoing Blair , Bush said the UN would play a role in all aspects of post - war Iraq , from humanitarian aid to a future interim authority , adding that Iraq would " move as quickly as possible " to an interim authority made up of Iraqis from inside and outside the country .

However , when pressed on what precisely the UN role would be , Bush on Tuesday mentioned only humanitarian work , " suggesting " people to staff the interim authority and helping Iraq " progress ."

" When we say vital role for the United Nations , we mean vital role for the United Nations in all aspects of the issue , whether it be humanitarian aid , or whether it be helping to stand up an interim authority .

Differences still remain between the United States and Britain , analysts said , over the speed with which Iraq should be handed to an interim Iraqi administration , and the extent to which a US - led group of generals and former diplomats should effectively run the country .

Yet , analysts argued , both Britain and the United States hope their agreed vision of a post war scenario will placate anti - war nations such as France , Germany and Russia .

" We will move as quickly as possible to place governmental responsibilities under the control of an interim authority composed of Iraqis from both inside and outside the country ," Bush vowed at the joint news conference with Blair , adding that the interim authority would serve until a permanent government could be chosen by the Iraqi people .

" Rebuilding of Iraq will require the support and expertise of the international community .

3,6 ORG|7,8 ORG|16,17 PER|25,26 PER|31,32 PER

Rumsfeld said afterward he hoped the U . N . would play a role but did not publicly discuss the draft resolution outlining that role .
0,1 PER|3,4 PER|6,9 ORG
0,1 PER|3,4 PER|6,9 ORG

Hoon , who joined Rumsfeld in a news conference at Heathrow airport , also did not mention the draft resolution .
0,1 PER|2,3 PER|4,5 PER|10,12 FAC
0,1 PER|2,3 PER|4,5 PER|10,12 FAC

`` We are right to be optimistic about the way forward '' in Iraq , Hoon said .
1,2 PER|13,14 GPE|15,16 PER
1,2 PER|13,14 GPE|15,16 PER

International stability forces will be sent to Iraq as soon as possible , the U . S . official said , though it was unclear when that would be .
2,3 ORG|7,8 GPE|14,17 GPE|18,19 PER|5,6 Movement:Transport|5,8 Destination
2,3 ORG|7,8 GPE|14,17 GPE|18,19 PER|5,6 Movement:Transport|5,8 Destination

Those troops will work to restore and maintain order and supervise humanitarian projects such as the restoration of water and electricity and delivery of food and medical aid .
1,2 PER
1,2 PER

The six nations contributing troops are Italy , Spain , Ukraine , Denmark , the Netherlands and Bulgaria , the official said .
2,3 GPE|4,5 PER|6,7 GPE|8,9 GPE|10,11 GPE|12,13 GPE|15,16 GPE|17,18 GPE|20,21 PER
2,3 GPE|4,5 PER|6,7 GPE|8,9 GPE|10,11 GPE|12,13 GPE|15,16 GPE|17,18 GPE|20,21 PER

Representatives of those countries will meet with British officials May 7 and Polish officials May 22 to determine what forces each country will contribute and whether they will be put under British or Polish command .
0,1 PER|3,4 GPE|7,8 GPE|8,9 PER|12,13 GPE|13,14 PER|19,20 ORG|21,22 GPE|26,27 ORG|31,32 GPE|33,34 GPE|5,6 Contact:Meet|0,6 r_Entity|5,9 Entity|5,14 Entity

The U . S . part of the stability force will be comprised of American troops .
1,4 GPE|5,6 ORG|9,10 ORG|14,15 GPE|15,16 PER
1,4 GPE|5,6 ORG|9,10 ORG|14,15 GPE|15,16 PER

While that portion is likely to consist of a military division _ about 20 , 000 _ the troop strength of the other two sectors has yet to be determined , the official said .
2,3 ORG|10,11 ORG|13,16 PER|18,19 PER|24,25 ORG|32,33 PER
2,3 ORG|10,11 ORG|13,16 PER|18,19 PER|24,25 ORG|32,33 PER

The international stabilization force would be under the U . S . war commander , Gen . Tommy Franks .
3,4 ORG|8,11 GPE|13,14 PER|15,16 PER|17,19 PER
3,4 ORG|8,11 GPE|13,14 PER|15,16 PER|17,19 PER

At least initially , the coalition stability forces will augment rather than replace the 135 , 000 American troops inside Iraq , the official said .
7,8 ORG|17,18 GPE|18,19 PER|20,21 GPE|23,24 PER
7,8 ORG|17,18 GPE|18,19 PER|20,21 GPE|23,24 PER

The stability forces will focus on providing security and humanitarian relief while other U . S . troops focus on rooting out leftover members of Saddam Hussein ' s government and other armed elements in Iraq .
2,3 ORG|13,16 GPE|17,18 PER|23,24 PER|25,27 PER|29,30 ORG|33,34 PER|35,36 GPE
2,3 ORG|13,16 GPE|17,18 PER|23,24 PER|25,27 PER|29,30 ORG|33,34 PER|35,36 GPE

Rumsfeld said , however , that the more troops other countries contribute to the stability effort , the fewer U . S . troops will be needed inside Iraq .
0,1 PER|8,9 PER|10,11 GPE|19,22 GPE|23,24 PER|28,29 GPE
0,1 PER|8,9 PER|10,11 GPE|19,22 GPE|23,24 PER|28,29 GPE

Planning for both the U . N . resolution and the international security force left out France , Germany and Russia , three U . S . allies that vehemently opposed the war in Iraq .
4,7 ORG|13,14 ORG|16,17 GPE|18,19 GPE|20,21 GPE|23,26 GPE|27,28 GPE|28,29 GPE|34,35 GPE|32,33 Conflict:Attack|32,35 Place

Some of the NATO members who agreed to send troops may want NATO authorization for that action , the official said .
0,1 GPE|3,4 ORG|4,5 GPE|5,6 GPE|9,10 PER|12,13 ORG|19,20 PER

Requests for such authorization will be routed through the alliance ' s defense planning committee , which does not include France , the official said .
9,10 ORG|14,15 ORG|16,17 ORG|20,21 GPE|23,24 PER
9,10 ORG|14,15 ORG|16,17 ORG|20,21 GPE|23,24 PER

The outlines for the international stability force were decided at a conference Hoon hosted Wednesday with representatives from 16 countries , mostly NATO members .

Other countries including the Philippines , South Korea , Qatar and Australia agreed to send other help such as field hospitals , engineers , explosive ordnance disposal teams or nuclear , biological and chemical weapons experts .

The U . S ., British and Polish sectors will be drawn to take into account ethnic , religious , tribal and political factions within Iraq , the official said .
1,4 GPE|5,6 GPE|7,8 GPE|8,9 ORG|23,24 PER|25,26 GPE|28,29 PER
1,4 GPE|5,6 GPE|7,8 GPE|8,9 ORG|23,24 PER|25,26 GPE|28,29 PER

For example , although ethnic Kurds are the majority in large parts of northern Iraq , there are also large numbers of Kurds within Baghdad .

BEIJING ( AP )
0,1 GPE|2,3 ORG
0,1 GPE|2,3 ORG

An accident on a diesel - powered Chinese submarine has killed all 70 officers and sailors aboard , the official Xinhua News Agency reported Friday .
7,8 GPE|8,9 VEH|13,14 PER|15,16 PER|20,23 ORG|10,11 Life:Die|10,14 Victim|10,16 Victim
7,8 GPE|8,9 VEH|13,14 PER|15,16 PER|20,23 ORG|10,11 Life:Die|10,14 Victim|10,16 Victim

The accident occurred `` recently '' in Chinese waters east of the Neichangshan islands , the brief Chinese - language report said .
7,8 GPE|8,9 LOC|12,14 LOC
7,8 GPE|8,9 LOC|12,14 LOC

The islands are in the Yellow Sea , between the northeastern province of Liaoning and North Korea .
1,2 LOC|5,7 LOC|11,12 GPE|13,14 GPE|15,17 GPE
1,2 LOC|5,7 LOC|11,12 GPE|13,14 GPE|15,17 GPE

The submarine was on an exercise when the accident occurred , and `` because of a mechanical malfunction , the 70 crew members on board died ,'' the Xinhua report said .
1,2 VEH|21,22 PER|22,23 PER|28,29 ORG|25,26 Life:Die|22,26 r_Victim
1,2 VEH|21,22 PER|22,23 PER|28,29 ORG|25,26 Life:Die|22,26 r_Victim

It did not give further details or say how the crew died .
10,11 PER|11,12 Life:Die|10,12 r_Victim
10,11 PER|11,12 Life:Die|10,12 r_Victim

The vessel already has been towed back to an unidentified port , Xinhua said .
1,2 VEH|10,11 GPE|12,13 ORG|5,6 Movement:Transport|1,6 r_Artifact|5,11 Destination
1,2 VEH|10,11 GPE|12,13 ORG|5,6 Movement:Transport|1,6 r_Artifact|5,11 Destination

It said the hull number was 361 , which military analysts said appeared to make it a Ming - class submarine , a vessel used for patrols and coastal defense .
0,1 ORG|10,11 PER|15,16 VEH|17,18 VEH|20,21 VEH|23,24 VEH
0,1 ORG|10,11 PER|15,16 VEH|17,18 VEH|20,21 VEH|23,24 VEH

The announcement was unusual for a communist government that rarely acknowledges military accidents .
7,8 GPE|8,9 GPE
7,8 GPE|8,9 GPE

It was the first time China has announced a fatal submarine mishap , said Bernard Cole , a professor at the U . N . National War College in Washington and a specialist on the Chinese navy .
5,6 GPE|10,11 VEH|14,16 PER|18,19 PER|21,24 GPE|25,28 ORG|29,30 GPE|32,33 PER|35,36 GPE|36,37 ORG
5,6 GPE|10,11 VEH|14,16 PER|18,19 PER|21,24 GPE|25,28 ORG|29,30 GPE|32,33 PER|35,36 GPE|36,37 ORG

`` There have been rumors going around about the loss of submarines , but this is the first fatal accident that I know of ,'' said Cole .
11,12 VEH|21,22 PER|26,27 PER|18,19 Life:Die
11,12 VEH|21,22 PER|26,27 PER|18,19 Life:Die

China ' s military , which has a tradition of secrecy , did not comment about the accident Friday night .
0,1 GPE|3,4 ORG|5,6 ORG
0,1 GPE|3,4 ORG|5,6 ORG

Foreign military analysts said it would be highly unusual for an accident to kill a whole submarine crew while still allowing the vessel to be recovered .
2,3 PER|16,17 VEH|17,18 PER|22,23 VEH|13,14 Life:Die|13,18 Victim
2,3 PER|16,17 VEH|17,18 PER|22,23 VEH|13,14 Life:Die|13,18 Victim

They suggested possible causes ranging from a sinking in shallow water to a disaster that flooded the vessel with toxic chemical fumes .
0,1 PER|17,18 VEH
0,1 PER|17,18 VEH

Michael McGinty , an expert on the Chinese navy from the Royal United Services Institute for Defense Studies in London , said that the mishap likely happened while the submarine was on the surface .
0,2 PER|4,5 PER|7,8 GPE|8,9 ORG|11,18 ORG|19,20 GPE|29,30 VEH
0,2 PER|4,5 PER|7,8 GPE|8,9 ORG|11,18 ORG|19,20 GPE|29,30 VEH

If the accident happened when the vessel was underwater , it was less likely that China could have recovered it , said McGinty , a former British submariner .
6,7 VEH|15,16 GPE|19,20 VEH|22,23 PER|26,27 GPE|27,28 PER
6,7 VEH|15,16 GPE|19,20 VEH|22,23 PER|26,27 GPE|27,28 PER

`` For an accident to have been so catastrophic when the submarine was on the surface , I find it a very mysterious thing ,'' he said .
11,12 VEH|17,18 PER|25,26 PER
11,12 VEH|17,18 PER|25,26 PER

McGinty said that the submarine ' s batteries might have leaked acid that mixed with seawater , creating toxic chlorine gas that killed the crew .
0,1 PER|4,5 VEH|24,25 PER|22,23 Life:Die|22,25 Victim
0,1 PER|4,5 VEH|24,25 PER|22,23 Life:Die|22,25 Victim

The torpedoes might have leaked propellant that poisoned the crew , he said .
1,2 WEA|9,10 PER|11,12 PER|7,8 Life:Die|7,10 Victim
1,2 WEA|9,10 PER|11,12 PER|7,8 Life:Die|7,10 Victim

The accident could have occurred as long ago as March , said Cole , a former U . S . Navy antisubmarine warfare officer .
12,13 PER|16,19 GPE|20,21 ORG|23,24 PER
12,13 PER|16,19 GPE|20,21 ORG|23,24 PER

`` There have been exercises going on in the Yellow Sea over the past two months ,'' he said .
9,11 LOC|17,18 PER
9,11 LOC|17,18 PER

`` This boat could have been involved in those exercises and gone down over a month ago .''
2,3 VEH
2,3 VEH

Cole said the loss of all hands suggested the vessel was flooded or sank because of a collision or engineering problem .
0,1 PER|6,7 PER|9,10 VEH|3,4 Life:Die|3,7 Victim
0,1 PER|6,7 PER|9,10 VEH|3,4 Life:Die|3,7 Victim

He said Ming - class subs usually carry a crew of 50 , suggesting that the others aboard might have been technicians or staff officers .
0,1 PER|2,3 VEH|5,6 VEH|9,10 PER|11,12 PER|16,17 PER|21,22 PER|24,25 PER
0,1 PER|2,3 VEH|5,6 VEH|9,10 PER|11,12 PER|16,17 PER|21,22 PER|24,25 PER

China began building the Ming - class subs in the 1970s , and they are obsolete by modern standards , according to the Federation of American Scientists .
0,1 GPE|4,5 VEH|7,8 VEH|13,14 VEH|23,27 ORG
0,1 GPE|4,5 VEH|7,8 VEH|13,14 VEH|23,27 ORG

The first three Ming - class subs were completed between 1971 and 1979 , and one of them was scrapped after a fire , according to the Web site of Jane ' s Information Group , a leading of source defense information .
3,4 VEH|6,7 VEH|15,16 VEH|17,18 VEH|30,35 ORG|39,40 ORG
3,4 VEH|6,7 VEH|15,16 VEH|17,18 VEH|30,35 ORG|39,40 ORG

China is believed to have as many as 19 Ming - class submarines .
0,1 GPE|9,10 VEH|12,13 VEH
0,1 GPE|9,10 VEH|12,13 VEH

China ' s submarine fleet includes 66 boats , most of them aging diesel - electric vessels , McGinty said .
0,1 GPE|3,4 VEH|4,5 VEH|7,8 VEH|9,10 VEH|11,12 VEH|16,17 VEH|18,19 PER
0,1 GPE|3,4 VEH|4,5 VEH|7,8 VEH|9,10 VEH|11,12 VEH|16,17 VEH|18,19 PER

He said the fleet suffers from a chronic lack of money , training and maintenance .
0,1 PER|3,4 VEH
0,1 PER|3,4 VEH

But the Chinese are aggressively updating their fleet with Russian - made Kilo - class diesel - electric subs .
2,3 GPE|6,7 GPE|7,8 VEH|9,10 GPE|12,13 VEH|18,19 VEH
2,3 GPE|6,7 GPE|7,8 VEH|9,10 GPE|12,13 VEH|18,19 VEH

`` The submarine force is the most potent part of the Chinese navy ,'' said Cole .
2,3 VEH|3,4 VEH|8,9 VEH|11,12 GPE|12,13 ORG|15,16 PER
2,3 VEH|3,4 VEH|8,9 VEH|11,12 GPE|12,13 ORG|15,16 PER

Despite the difficulty of maintaining a fleet , subs are valuable because they are hard to detect , Cole said .
6,7 VEH|8,9 VEH|12,13 VEH|18,19 PER
6,7 VEH|8,9 VEH|12,13 VEH|18,19 PER

In a conflict over Taiwan or some other confrontation , he said , `` China ' s ability to field a force of even a dozen submarines could pose a big problem for any other naval force .''

Portland Trail Blazers coach Maurice Cheeks received permission Monday to interview for the Philadelphia 76ers ' vacant coaching job , possibly dooming the candidacy of Eddie Jordan , a Nets assistant who interviewed for that same position earlier this week .
0,3 ORG|3,4 PER|4,6 PER|13,15 ORG|25,27 PER|29,30 ORG|30,31 PER|31,32 PER
